Collaboration diagram for fcmaes.journal.Base_message:
Detailed Description
Represents the base structure of a message.
This class serves as a base for creating message objects. It defines common attributes that are essential for message handling, such as operation code and worker identifier. Intended to be used as a foundational data structure for various message-related operations.
associated with the message.
